name: Universal Multi-Threaded Server
short_description: Use XML to instantly bind any functions from dynamic libraries into a high performance, multi-threaded server processing pipeline. The Universal Multi-Threaded Server is an Agile development tool to facilitate rapid prototyping, testing and module development. An arbitrary number of functional routines in external libraries are defined in an XML file and executed as a pipeline on one or more input streams with complete asynchronous queue support. External functions are dynamically bound at runtime to provide complete flexibility in upgrading, replacing or extending software modules.
